user.title: Integration Tester
user.description:
Enter a GitHub URL to download a custom integration.

Supported formats:
- `github.com/owner/repo` (default branch)
- `github.com/owner/repo/tree/branch-name`
- `github.com/owner/repo/pull/123`
- `github.com/owner/repo/commit/abc123`

data_description.github_token: Required for API rate limits. Create a token at github.com/settings/tokens with no special scopes needed for public repos.
data_description.restart: Automatically restart Home Assistant after the integration is installed.

select_integration.title: Select Integration
select_integration.description:
This PR modifies multiple integrations: {integrations}

Select which integration to install:

confirm_overwrite.title: Confirm Overwrite
confirm_overwrite.description:
The folder `custom_components/{domain}` already exists but wasn't installed by Integration Tester.

Proceeding will **delete the existing folder** and replace it.

If you previously installed this integration via HACS, note that HACS could overwrite the PR/branch/commit version of the integration with a released version, or vice versa.

It is recommended that the integration is removed from HACS while you manage it via Integration Tester, and once you are done, delete it from Integration Tester and re-add it to HACS.

Note that you may need to reconfigure the integration depending on what's changed between versions.

confirm_entry_overwrite.title: Replace Existing Entry
confirm_entry_overwrite.description:
Integration Tester is already tracking `{domain}` from:

`{existing_url}`

Do you want to **remove the existing entry** and track from the new source instead?

error.invalid_url: Invalid GitHub URL. Please enter a valid GitHub repository, branch, PR, or commit URL.
error.invalid_token: Invalid GitHub token. Please check that the token is correct and has not expired.
error.manifest_not_found: Could not find manifest.json in this repository. Expected structure: custom_components/<domain>/manifest.json
error.core_requires_pr: For Home Assistant core repository, please use a pull request URL so we can determine which integration to extract.
error.no_integrations_found: No integrations found in this PR. The PR may not modify any files in homeassistant/components/.

abort.already_configured_same_repo: This integration is already tracked from this repository by Integration Tester. Delete the existing Integration Tester entry to switch references.
abort.already_configured_different_repo: This integration domain is already tracked from a different repository by Integration Tester. Delete the existing Integration Tester entry first.
abort.multiple_integrations_found: This PR modifies multiple integrations. Please use the UI to select which integration to install.
abort.no_token: No GitHub token is configured. Please set up via the UI first.
abort.core_requires_pr: Cannot install from Home Assistant core repository without a PR. Use a pull request URL to specify which integration to extract.

init.title: Integration Tester Options
init.description:
Configure options for tracking `{domain}`.

**Note:** To change the tracked branch, PR, or commit, remove this config entry and add a new one.

The GitHub token is a global setting shared across all Integration Tester entries.

data_description.github_token: Increases API rate limit from 60 to 5,000 requests/hour.

restart_required.title: Restart Required
restart_required.description: Integration `{domain}` has been installed/updated. Please restart Home Assistant to apply the changes.

pr_merged.title: PR Merged
pr_merged.description:
The pull request #{pr_number} for `{domain}` has been **merged**.

The code is now in the target branch. You should either:
- Switch to tracking the target branch
- Remove this config entry

Click 'Fix' to remove this config entry and clean up the installed files.

pr_closed.title: PR Closed
pr_closed.description:
The pull request #{pr_number} for `{domain}` has been **closed without merging**.

You should remove this config entry.

Click 'Fix' to remove this config entry and clean up the installed files.

integration_removed.title: Integration Removed from PR
integration_removed.description:
The integration `{domain}` is no longer modified by this pull request.

This can happen if the PR was rebased or the changes were reverted.

Click 'Fix' to remove this config entry and clean up the installed files.

download_failed.title: Download Failed

token_invalid.title: GitHub Token Invalid
token_invalid.description:
The GitHub personal access token is invalid, expired, or has been revoked.

Please update the token in any Integration Tester entry's options.

This issue will automatically resolve when a valid token is configured.
